resources.string: \n \n Bored of playing high end graphic games??Here is a game for you that tests your luck in guessing a number. You have to guess the correct number within the specified range before you run out of your attempts. For every wrong guess you will be given a clue of whether the number is below or above the previous guess.

Name : I. Srikanth
